author: cutting
msg: Add a target for nightly build.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: mod_proxy: Add proxy-sendextracrlf option to send an extra CRLF at the
end of the request body to work with really old HTTP servers.
present, append a CRLF to the body stream that isn't counted against CL.

author: steveh
msg: You can now skip the docs portion of 'build.dist' by adding -Dskip.docs=true.

author: burton
msg: Refactored to support more tests anchors that don't have attributes.  Also support anchors with CDATA and images

author: ddewolf
msg: -- Removing bug causing Reordering of Servlets and Mappings
-- Removing bug causing Reordering of Portlets
